comment: A version of ~ dral1 with a context. Note: At first glance one might be tempted to generalize this (or a similar) theorem by weakening the first two hypotheses adding a ` x = y ` , ` A. x x = y ` or ` ph ` antecedent. ~ wl-equsal1i and ~ nf5di show that this is in fact pointless. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 28-Jul-2019.)
